author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...IVO FORECAST TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW BY EARLY MONDAY...
summary: ...IVO FORECAST TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW BY EARLY MONDAY... As of 8:00 AM PDT Sun Aug 10 the center of Ivo was located near 21.9, -116.1 with movement WNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...IVO FORECAST TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW BY EARLY MONDAY... As of 8:00 AM PDT Sun Aug 10 the center of Ivo was located near 21.9, -116.1 with movement WNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1006 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Ivo (EP4/EP092025)
